build.buildCommand: cd reviews-platform && composer install --no-dev --no-scripts --optimize-autoloader && npm install && npm run build

deploy.startCommand: cd reviews-platform && mkdir -p bootstrap/cache storage/framework/cache storage/framework/sessions storage/framework/views storage/app/public/logos storage/app/public/backgrounds storage/app/public/photos && chmod -R 755 bootstrap/cache storage && php artisan migrate --force && php artisan db:seed --class=AdminUserSeeder --force && php artisan storage:link && php artisan serve --host=0.0.0.0 --port=$PORT
